title: geth crash
body:
os: osx 10.10
commit: 6dec90464dc2a263a5bcb72fdbff6c5439fb07dc
scenario:
1. start `geth console`
2. unclock accounts, start rpc server
3. do some random rpc requests (i will try to give more details if i reproduce this)
